QuestData.Title: Gharmal's Tower
QuestData.Description:
Gharmal collected anything they believed to be an item of power.
We'll need to search the tower. There is almost certainly something here of value to us.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Alexandros Mograine at the top of Gharmal's Tower at the House of Constructs.
QuestData.RewardText: That is definitely something. Let's open it and find out.
